    XPEL Paint Protection Film

    Starting at $1,499 • Free Consultation

    What Is PPF?

    The Ultimate Shield for Your Vehicle's Paint

    Paint Protection Film (PPF) is a virtually invisible, thermoplastic urethane film applied to your vehicle's exterior painted surfaces. Originally developed for military helicopter blades to resist sand and debris erosion, PPF technology has evolved into the gold standard for automotive paint preservation.

    At Bespoke Auto Design in Miami, we exclusively install XPEL Ultimate Plus™ — the world's most advanced self-healing paint protection film.

    Miami Climate Protection

    Why Miami Vehicles Need PPF

    South Florida's combination of extreme UV, salt air, highway debris, and year-round heat creates the perfect storm for paint damage. Here's how PPF fights back.

    UV & Sun Protection

    Miami ranks among the highest UV index cities in the U.S. XPEL PPF blocks harmful UV rays that cause paint oxidation, fading, and clear coat failure — keeping your finish factory-fresh.

    Rock Chip Defense

    I-95, the Palmetto, and Florida's Turnpike are notorious for road debris. PPF absorbs impact energy from stones, gravel, and construction material that would otherwise chip your paint.

    Salt Air & Humidity

    Living near Miami Beach, Brickell, or the Keys means constant exposure to corrosive salt air. PPF creates an impermeable barrier that prevents salt-induced micro-corrosion and water spotting.

    Self-Healing Technology

    XPEL's elastomeric polymer top coat eliminates light scratches and swirl marks when exposed to heat. In Miami's sun, most surface blemishes disappear within minutes while parked.

    Resale Value Preservation

    Paint condition is one of the biggest factors in resale value. PPF keeps your paint in concours condition, adding thousands of dollars to your vehicle's trade-in or private sale price.

    10-Year XPEL Warranty

    Every installation is backed by XPEL's comprehensive 10-year manufacturer warranty against yellowing, cracking, peeling, staining, and delamination — even in Florida's harsh climate.

    Why XPEL?

    The XPEL Advantage

    Not all paint protection films are created equal. XPEL has spent over two decades refining their films to deliver unmatched clarity, durability, and performance. As a certified XPEL installer in Miami, Bespoke Auto Design uses the full XPEL ecosystem — from the Design Access Program (DAP) for precision-cut templates to the Ultimate Plus™ film and Fusion Plus™ ceramic coating for post-installation care.

    Precision DAP templates for 100,000+ vehicle fitments
    Optically clear — invisible on any paint color
    Self-healing top coat eliminates swirl marks
    Stain-resistant against bird droppings & tree sap
    Non-yellowing formula engineered for high-UV climates
    Edge-seal technology prevents lifting and peeling
    Transferable 10-year manufacturer warranty
    Safe removal with zero paint damage
    Our Process

    How We Install PPF

    Every installation follows a meticulous multi-step process in our climate-controlled facility in Miami.

    01

    Consultation

    We assess your vehicle, discuss your driving habits, and recommend the ideal coverage package.

    02

    Surface Prep

    Your vehicle is hand-washed, clay-barred, and any existing paint imperfections are polished before film application.

    03

    Precision Install

    XPEL DAP templates are applied with surgical precision, edges are tucked, and every seam is sealed.

    04

    Quality Inspection

    Multi-point inspection under controlled lighting ensures flawless coverage before delivery.
